name: The Grave Runner
description:
Run! Don't stop! Don't think! Don't contemplate!  To save yourself you need to avoid anything that can evoke existential angst. _________ _________

The Grave Runner is a mini side-scroller game where you can RUN, jump, and try to survive. I could explain myself, and say what I wanted to express here, but honestly, it will speak to you or it won't. Thanks to this project I learned a lot of C# and unity. 

Exceptional 16-bit pixelart comes from an asset pack made by Cyangmou: https://cyangmou.itch.io/side-scroller-churchyard-tileset

Have fun!
